attributes.action: Protect Our Democracy or give us a 3rd 4th referendum & so on If you grant a 2nd
attributes.additional_details: The Prime Minister and all other senior officials said they is no going back, once in a generation vote etc etc. This is a referrendum not a neverendum and so on. Now the European fans are wanting to have another vote to get a remain result. This is a cheat, fraud a deciet. Please people this is a attack on our democracy they knew the rules but now not playing ball. The goverment, senior officials and the elite are all behind remain. But the Brits have challenged that but they still saying no no
attributes.background: The British People have spoken we have voted to leave the EU. But our democracy is under attack by people who wasnt bothered voting before but now want to invade on our country and tie it up in nots again with the EU. I say we were brave to vote leave then and brave now. Sign for a 3rd referrendum.
